title: South australia league of legends event!
body:
Hey all!
ive recently been talking with some mates and decided we wanted to do something about the lack of league of legends events in South australia as we have no High school teams and our university teams are very minimal, therfore we want to host a tournement in which we would have cosplay, a 1v1 and 5v5 tournments and overall have a great day of fun, as for us the plan an event like this we would need to see how many people would be interested in attending, depedning on how many people we can get will depend on what we can and cant do along with the value of prizes etc, if your a league of legends gamer and are in south australia or have a friend thats here, SEND THEM TO THIS THREAD!
This event would likely be held in The Galwer/Barossa area
All you need to do is comment your
Name -
Summoner name -
Age -
Division - 
Gender -
and last but not least what event you would most enjoy seeing in a local event, if we have enough interested players there will be a discord setup which all player will be invited to, your invite will be posted as a reply to your comment on this thread so stay tuned! and make sue to spread the word lets make league big again!

replies.body:
Angus
FaleafDragon
19
unranked

i love the sound of what you guys are trying to do so if ya need any help let me know
